vulnerability.name: USN-4049-4
vulnerability.description: USN-4049-1 fixed a vulnerability in GLib. The update introduced a regression. This update fixes the problem.  We apologize for the inconvenience.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that GLib created directories and files without properly  restricting permissions. An attacker could possibly use this issue to access  sensitive information.

statements.status_notes: USN-4049-1 introduced a regression in GLib. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
